articles.title: Malcolm Jamal-Warner Drowning Death: Second Swimmer Survived Ordeal - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The Red Cross in Costa Rica says one unnamed swimmer was resuscitated and is in a local clinic, while Warner could not be revived using CPR and died at the scene.
articles.content: First responders in Costa Rica managed to revive a second swimmer in distress on Sunday using CPR, but were unable to save the life of The Cosby Show star Malcolm-Jamal Warner, The Hollywood Reporter… [+1435 chars]
